author: ian_dickinson
msg: Fix and test for SF bug 978259. In order to correctly choose a strategy
for detecting individuals, there is  a new capabilty property
individualAsThingP, which reasoners can add to their capabilities to denote
that they infer an individual has rdf:type owl:Thing (or daml:Thing)
